name: Math Race (itch) (yahya yozo)
description:
In a funny arcade mode, enjoy taking some basic math tasks by moving to the right box.
This game has three modes : 1- Operation Mode: you need to move your player to the box containing the correct answer for the operation written below
2- Operators Mode: you have the guess the missing operator to equilibrate the equation 3- Prime Numbers Mode: you must choose the only prime number from 4 propositions from the boxes.
